ussd_adapter.description: Provides Unstructured Supplementary Service Data (USSD) messaging interface between applications and SDP.

requirements.REQ-USSD-1: Supports MO and MT USSD flows
requirements.REQ-USSD-2: Supports USSD session-based communication (dialogue maintained for multiple request-response cycles)
requirements.REQ-USSD-3: Supports SLA enforcement for USSD throughput and session limits
requirements.REQ-USSD-4: Handles prepaid charging validation for USSD sessions
requirements.REQ-USSD-5: Generates CDRs for all USSD interactions
requirements.REQ-USSD-6: Supports error reporting and session timeout handling
requirements.REQ-USSD-7: Supports multiple concurrent sessions per subscriber
requirements.REQ-USSD-8: Supports integration with external USSD Gateway (IN/NW components)
